name: Tiny Tanks (itch) (Captain Bear Games)
description:
This is a small game made in the course of about a month just to play with making pixel art in the VGA16 palette and to try out some ideas for a Tank video game in the style of old DOS games.

Story

In 18 minutes, the world changed...

Your tank unit was stationed in the Mojave desert when the first volley of nukes launched. You watched in horror as the spires climbed skyward, scarring the noon sky. Moments later, the enemy's clouds blossomed on the horizon all around, nearly blinding as the sun.

It was time to head east. The war has begun.

Controls

  • WS to move forward/back
  • AD to rotate right/left
  • Q and E to change weapons
  • Mouse Right and Left to move turret
  • Left Mouse Button to Fire
  • Alt-F4 to exit
